post.description: Query the registry for available and online (health-checked) entries. Registry filter, allows pagination, filtering by payment type and capability and optional date filters (to force update any entries checked before the specified date. Warning: this might take a bit of time as response is not cached). If no filter is set, only online entries are returned.
